summary: A useful female mage imperial companion / spouse that can be found in The Drunken Huntsman
descriptionHtml:
Name: Maria Kolskegg
Race: Imperial
Class: Mage
Speciality: Conjurer but can also heal herself
Location: Whiterun - The Drunken Huntsman

Required mods: ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Cousin with Sylgja and friend with Lydia
She is a potential follower and spouse

Treat her well, she deserves it. :)
author: Flanker69
